	We are a supermarket of fintech companies seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Accountant to join our finance team.

	Strong knowledge of Accounting Principles

	Excellent accounting and analytical skills and attention to detail.

	Time Management: Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Procurement Assistant",
  "description": "New Foundation for Displaced Persons (NFDP) is a non- governmental organization established under the Nigeria law dedicated to providing crucial support to individuals displaced by insurgency and crises to survival, recover and rebuild their lives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Procurement Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Borno
Employment Type: Contract
Duration: 6 months

Job Summary


	The Procurement Assistant will support the procurement team in sourcing, purchasing, and contract management.
	He / She will gain hands-on experience in procurement processes, contributing to the organization&#39;s operational efficiency.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist with procurement processes, including tendering and bidding
	Support contract management and vendor selection
	Maintain procurement records and databases
	Conduct market research and supplier identification
	Help with purchase order processing and invoicing
	Support procurement reporting and compliance
	Assist with inventory management and stock control
	&nbsp;Carryout all documents photocopying, scanning, archiving procurement files &amp;reception of goods.
	Proper filing of all procurement documents.
	Sending a request for feedback regarding suppliers&rsquo; performance &amp; update supplier files.
	Ensuring that all Supplies, services, and equipment required are delivered in time
	Expedite suppliers to ensure timely delivery of goods and services and address any delays or issues.
	Maintain and update the asset inventory, ensuring accurate record-keeping for office equipment and supplies.
	Ensure proper documentation and filling of logistics documents for easy retrieval and audit readiness.
	Support any assign task in the organization.
	Assist in data entry and updating databases, ensuring accuracy and completeness of information.
	Follow-up internally between the Procurement and Logistics department and the Finance department on procurement-related transactions.
	Support in the asset disposal process in accordance with organizational policies and procedures.
	Following the guidance of the procurement staff, to ensure that all fields&rsquo; goods, to be dispatched along with all the needed documentation (Waybill).
	Collaborate with suppliers to build and maintain good working relationships.


Job Requirements


	ND / Diploma qualification, B.Sc Degree in Supply Chain Management, Economics and Business Administration.
	Basic understanding of operations and logistics management.
	Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).
	Good communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work as a team.
	Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
	Fluency in English required; knowledge of Hausa or local languages is an asset.


Skills and Behaviours (Our Values in Practice):
Transparency, Accountability, Partnerships, Integrity, Team Building:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;


	Accuracy and timeliness in all areas of responsibility

Procurement Assistant Job at New Foundation for Displaced Persons (NFDP)




        
    

        
        New Foundation for Displaced Persons (NFDP) is a non- governmental organization established under the Nigeria law dedicated to providing crucial support to individuals displaced by insurgency and crises to survival, recover and rebuild their lives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Assistant

Job Location: Borno
Employment Type: Contract
Duration: 6 months

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Procurement Assistant will support the procurement team in sourcing, purchasing, and contract management.
	He / She will gain hands-on experience in procurement processes, contributing to the organization's operational efficiency.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist with procurement processes, including tendering and bidding
	Support contract management and vendor selection
	Maintain procurement records and databases
	Conduct market research and supplier identification
	Help with purchase order processing and invoicing
	Support procurement reporting and compliance
	Assist with inventory management and stock control
	 Carryout all documents photocopying, scanning, archiving procurement files &reception of goods.
	Proper filing of all procurement documents.
	Sending a request for feedback regarding suppliers’ performance & update supplier files.
	Ensuring that all Supplies, services, and equipment required are delivered in time
	Expedite suppliers to ensure timely delivery of goods and services and address any delays or issues.
	Maintain and update the asset inventory, ensuring accurate record-keeping for office equipment and supplies.
	Ensure proper documentation and filling of logistics documents for easy retrieval and audit readiness.
	Support any assign task in the organization.
	Assist in data entry and updating databases, ensuring accuracy and completeness of information.
	Follow-up internally between the Procurement and Logistics department and the Finance department on procurement-related transactions.
	Support in the asset disposal process in accordance with organizational policies and procedures.
	Following the guidance of the procurement staff, to ensure that all fields’ goods, to be dispatched along with all the needed documentation (Waybill).
	Collaborate with suppliers to build and maintain good working relationships.


Job Requirements


	ND / Diploma qualification, B.Sc Degree in Supply Chain Management, Economics and Business Administration.
	Basic understanding of operations and logistics management.
	Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).
	Good communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work as a team.
	Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
	Fluency in English required; knowledge of Hausa or local languages is an asset.


Skills and Behaviours (Our Values in Practice):
Transparency, Accountability, Partnerships, Integrity, Team Building:    


	Accuracy and timeliness in all areas of responsibility
	High level of accuracy in work, and ability to analyse complex sets of relationships and situations
	Holds self and others accountable
	Knowledge of Microsoft application, Such as Excel, Word, Power point.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skill.


Integrity:


	Honesty, encourages openness and transparency, demonstrates highest levels of integrity.


Desirable Criteria:


	Ability to multi-task, engage in long-term planning, meet deadlines, and handle last-minute demands; exercise patience, and adapt to changing circumstances.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover letter in one PDF document to: info@newfdp.org using the Job Posiiton as the subject of the mail.

        HiiT Plc owns Nigeria's foremost ICT Training / Education Institute, HiiT Training Institute (HiiT for short) with Training Centres across the Nation. We commenced training operations as Hands-on Institute of Information Technology (HiiT) on Monday, 15th April 1996, and we have graduated over 50,000 Students at our Training Centres across the Nation in the past 24 years.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Python Programming Instructor 
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	This is a contract hybrid role for a Python Programming Instructor at HiiT PLC.
	The instructor will be responsible for delivering high-quality lessons in Python Programming including preparing and delivering tasks, engaging lessons, assessing student progress, providing feedback, and facilitating interactive learning sessions.


Qualifications


	Must be resident in Lagos (Lekki or environs)
	Proficiency in Python programming language.
	Experience in curriculum development.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to convey complex technical concepts in an understandable manner
	Strong General ICT knowledge.
	Certifications in Python or related technologies is an advantage.
	Have strong knowledge of OOP and backend framework such as Django.
	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, or related fields.
	Knowledge of industry trends and best practices.
